lender.name: Libia

lender.name: Glynis

lender.occupational_info: I am a musician. I compose music and play trombone. I perform in many different clubs and parties and also teach music to teenagers.

lender.name: Matt

lender.name: Cory

lender.name: Kevin & Pam
lender.loan_because: We have received so much in Christ and are glad to share His love through this effort.

lender.name: Ariel

lender.name: Nicole

lender.occupational_info: I tell computers what they should do in order to be helpful tools.

lender.name: Timothy

lender.occupational_info: I work as an immigration lawyer for Catholic Social Services in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA.

lender.name: Team Ecnarf

lender.name: N.G

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be living in a country with great wealth and opportunity. I like the idea of being able to make a difference in the lives people for whom a few American dollars can potentially make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small biotech start-up that hopes to revolutionize the field gene sequencing.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I care about the little people who are often over looked. And being in the top 10% of the richest people in the world just by being born in America I think we have a responsibility to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of women in the hospital who have just had babies. I take care of their babies when they are sick.

lender.name: Lauren

lender.occupational_info: I am a Freshman at George School in Newtown, PA. I love social studies so giving to people around the world is so interesting.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Darin

lender.occupational_info: I work on doing things that have never been done before so that all maybe better off.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I like that I can support people over and over and over with my small contribution. I feel that I am making a difference in helping others to reach their goals with pride and self-respect.

lender.name: Kevan Moran Aponte
lender.loan_because: I'm a self employed woman and I think this is a great way to help other self employed people.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who works with glass. I live in the Pacific Northwest on the beach with my husband and our dog, Bungee.

lender.name: Owen

lender.occupational_info: Get the best grades I can and I'm nuts about playing Lacrosse

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I believe that Jesus commands Christians to love the people of this world not just in words but in deed, as He did for us. Jesus has filled my heart with so much, and must give what little I have in resources back to HIM!
lender.occupational_info: I teach an energetic class of 4 and 5 year olds, and I love watching them learn and grow, especially when we learn about the Bible!

lender.name: Brian

lender.name: Miracle Noodle Inc.

lender.name: Julio
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.

lender.name: Jeanie

lender.name: Henry

lender.name: In Memory of Dorothy

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe this will make a difference in a world, where Corporations and Governments are failing mostly due to greed.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business where I restore cars, airplanes, and boats. Making parts from metal.

lender.occupational_info: I am a web consultant, but rather seek to tap the power of micro financing and micro business in the marletplace

lender.name: Anneloes

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I respect anyone who wants to stand on their own two feet and make a go of things, and I want to help them where I can.

lender.occupational_info: Empowering young adults to believe in their capacities by teaching something as enriching as Greek, Latin and Classical Culture

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I love my work and feel lucky that I have the resources to support my business and the luxury of not having to support my family on the income the business generates. I'm happy to be able to give back some of my profits to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I craft eco-friendly jewelry using recycled fine and sterling silver and fair trade/ethically sourced gemstones and other materials.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to live in a country where access to capital can make business dreams come true. The least I can do is try and provide the same to other countries.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help other women realize their dreams.

lender.name: Melissa

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: "But whoever has the world's goods, and sees his brother in need and closes his heart against him, how does the love of God abide in him?" 1 John 3:17
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home and husband and volunteer at my church as an administrator and as a Bible study leader.

lender.occupational_info: We are hard working college students taking a course called "The Global Experience." We are learning about how microfinance can help entrepreneurs in developing countries help themselves!

lender.name: Tanya
lender.occupation: Consultant who works to reduce pesticide use
lender.loan_because: I've always been interested in micro-lending and thought it was a great idea, but not until I found Kiva did I know how to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I have a very tiny consulting business where I work with organizations and government agencies to help them reduce their use of pesticide and implement "integrated pest management" (IPM) in urban areas. IPM uses many different methods to combat pests such as sanitation, pest proofing, and trapping. Pesticides are one tool of many and are used as a last resort.

lender.name: Fred & Mary
lender.loan_because: Helping people better their lives and providing hope for a better future is the key to overcoming the destructive ideologies that threaten us all.

lender.name: Sivakumar
lender.loan_because: I feel happy that I can help some to make a big difference their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on smallest possible electronic device that enables faster computation and data storage.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: i'm rich

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work for a great company and sell advertising on the internet

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: Jesus said: 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' Matthew 25:40

lender.name: SavorySisters
lender.occupational_info: evolving

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help other mothers and fathers achieve their goals so they can provide for their children. We may not all have the same opportunities, but we all equally strive to do our best for our families.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have more than I need. What use to me is more than I need unless it can be given to someone who does need.
lender.occupational_info: I own 50% of a successful insurance broker based in Stratford-upon-Avon

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: It seems right. Hope it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Colorado. I work as a biologist but I am at home raising my daughter now.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: There are so many people in this world who are not as fortunate as me and my family. If everyone could help just one person help themselves, just imagine how different the future can be.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 young children, a wife, and I volunteer my time to many charitable organizations as well as my children's schools.

lender.name: Famille Bayard-Potvin
lender.loan_because: Parce que les habitants de notre planète sont aussi de notre famille.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.occupational_info: Managing lease terms and payments for different companies

lender.name: Khadija
lender.loan_because: I read Muhammad Yunnus's book: Banker to the Poor and it taught me that if everyone does their part we can help end poverty in this world!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a psychology student and I work in an office as an administrative assistant (typing, scheduling appointments, opening mail, etc.).

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Loans help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company that invests in large, growing private companies

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: I have seen firsthand how such a little amount to me can go such a long way for others...

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: the people are awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I learn for a living.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: It is such a small amount of money to give...The idea of being able to "make a difference" by giving $25 is inspiring. I love to help those who help themselves :) This is a wonderful way to give back....

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to see if this brilliant idea works and want to support it. I am doing fine, my family is well and I have the funds to invest some money.

lender.name: Sacramento RPCVs
lender.occupational_info: We are returned Peace Corps Volunteers continuing to pursue the goals of Peace Corps here at home.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to believe, when I am ready to pass on and am looking back at the course of my life, that I somehow made a difference in the lives of others. To leave the world a better place with my having been in it! I also donate because faith without works is not really faith at all.
lender.occupational_info: I help prepare patients who are going to receive cardiac catheterization procedures in the hospital and I instruct them in ways to improve their heart health.

lender.name: Hadley
lender.loan_because: It's my belief that if we each did what we were able to do to help others - not above and beyond, simply what we are able to do - we could change the world.

lender.name: ROBIN
lender.loan_because: I have a very happy life filled with love and opportunity I want to pay it back and help to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my time to those that are in need. It might be to read to someone that is blind, to hold a hand of someone that is hurting, or to just listen. I work as a cashier for my job and love seeing the same people shopping each week. We have become friends.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Because usury is a sin and life is about helping each other as we can.

lender.name: Andrew Vrana
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have everything I do. I want to help other's realize their dreams and microfinance is the gift that keeps giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of empowerment. I am educating myself with the tools necessary to empower others and make a difference in the 'developing' world. Ideally I would like to work in micro finance

lender.name: Arlina
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of a company's money.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make a difference in their life and their community
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university and help people make changes in their life through therapy

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I want to make an impact on the world. I can make a small difference in one person's life for the better through Kiva.org.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of twin girls and I own my own business, Innerspace Marketing, LLC in Texas. I know how hard it is to be a successful entrepreneur. I hope to help other women around the world find strength and joy in working for themselves.

lender.name: Pele and Kalil
lender.loan_because: we care

lender.name: Bryant
lender.loan_because: I think microcredit is a genius idea! I also want to encourage entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a team to answer challenging, data-intensive questions.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that people should be given the opportunity to suceed in a private business.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small company attending to many details:payroll, cash flow, accounting, marketing.

lender.name: Marge
lender.loan_because: In memory of my beloved husband, Dave.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I was given the opportunity to succeed. Once you've received that gift, you must pass it on...
lender.occupational_info: I teach executives how to better use their resources (people, money, technology, and data) to increase the sales and profits of their companies.

lender.name: Corey Ovendale
lender.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that people get paid for their intellectual property.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I love to see women entrepreneurs making a difference in their lives, the lives of their families, neighborhoods and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a woman business owner with my husband. My very small company installs electrical wiring for homes and businesses.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I don't have the time to do anything more physical at the moment.

lender.name: Marc daigle
lender.loan_because: Why not?If only I had known before that you existed..what a beautiful way to share..
lender.occupational_info: dancer..performer....facilitator of health world traveler

lender.name: Mount Madonna School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can help people who cannot borrow money from a regular bank. We get help from Kiva in learning about risk and due diligence and how to use modern technology to help others in need across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Part of our curriculum is to produce a DVD and sell it to raise money for a social service project. Kiva provides a perfect win-win opportunity because we help those in need and the money comes back to our school. Next year we will repeat the process again.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I want every person in all countries to have the same opportunities that I have had.

lender.name: City Sylvester
lender.loan_because: I know who I am.
lender.occupational_info: I help people reconnect with their passions in life.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic social experiment and great way to better the lives of those in need.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to give others the ability to improve their lives, and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Lending to hardworking individuals is not only inspirational, but grants the privilege of making the world a better place.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: PrewrittenContent.com
lender.loan_because: I love helping others make money. Seriously I do.
lender.occupational_info: Well help writers buy and sell content on PrewrittenContent.com

lender.name: Treger
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone knows how important a mom is.

lender.name: Sam & Mary
lender.loan_because: funds provide needed capital to stimulate economic wealth for people in these world communities.
lender.occupational_info: Retired educators. Independent business LImited Liability Company-Private Investor providing quality services and products with resilience, credibility, integrity, reliability, and caring.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I admire people who run their own businesses. I also want to help those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I do the best I can to get by.

lender.name: Giovannie
lender.loan_because: it feels good to know that you are making someone's load a little lighter. Some one said: "To the world you may be one person, but to one person, you may be the world."
lender.occupational_info: about 70% of my time is spent auditioning and being a single mom. The other 30% I'm working on camera or in a voice over booth acting.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute to the success, happiness and well being of others.
lender.occupational_info: I design research to collect information on how people engage with public spaces and retail stores, and various products or elements in those environments. The research aids in store design, layout, signage and information systems, as well as product placement.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student and a teacher's assistant. I make a low-income, but I like to share what I have.

lender.name: Benjamin Caudill
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping those who help themselves, while promotion capitalism and providing interest-free capital to 3rd world entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I prevent computer hackers from getting into corporate computers and networks.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a shot or two.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: one of the ways a person can look after their self interests and their happiness is by giving priority to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of animals in other people's homes when they are going to be gone for an extended amount of time.

lender.name: Inez
lender.loan_because: God loves a cheerful giver. I hope to meet the people whom I have helped in heaven some day.

lender.name: Susan and Bill
lender.loan_because: It's important to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Retired educators of children aged 10 to 18

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: It's a very simple way for me to make someone's life better.

lender.name: Chantell
lender.loan_because: Where I live, there are banks that provide credit access. This is not the case everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying international development in grad school. I guess one must practice what they preach.

lender.name: laura & Jim
lender.loan_because: To help.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can. (..and I am grateful for that.)

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I feel that people need the oportunity to be sucsesful at what they want to do

lender.name: Jeremy B. Shapiro
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me over the years, and this is one of my ways of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs get their passion off of paper and into practice through marketing consulting, product creation and business consulting

lender.name: chelsea + landon
lender.occupational_info:
chelsea is an architectural designer with gensler, a global design firm spanning 30 offices worldwide. http://gensler.com/
landon is a market developer at chempoint, north america's largest e-distributor of fine and specialty chemicals. http://www.chempoint.com/

lender.name: Rae
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to see people, especially women, become more independent, and have a better life for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I helped older people living in a large community of apartments, with messages, mail, order meals, answer phones, took guest and maintence orders,

lender.name: Jeff, Tanya & family
lender.loan_because: We lend as a family. Each of us want to help.

lender.name: Rene Guerrero
lender.loan_because: "What can I give back to God for the blessings he's poured out on me? I'll lift high the cup of salvation as a toast to our Father, I'll fulfill a promise I made to him." Bono, Elevation 2001, Live from Boston (listen to it at link below)
lender.occupational_info: We enjoy running, biking, lifting weights and spending time with family.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: As a family with young children who have a great life together we want to help others enjoy the fruits of their labours too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a customer service manager, and work very hard. I want to help others with the same work ethic who have not had the lucky breaks in life that we have had.

lender.name: ariana
lender.loan_because: those who have money should give to those who don't
lender.occupational_info: i make books

lender.name: Tambobamba
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to build a business and provide for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to build a food company that provides great tasting, healthy products AND builds community and bridges cultural gaps with our friends in Latin America.

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: Most of the time it takes money to make money. I put myself through college with several jobs and the help of loans. I don't know where I would be today without that opportunity to get an education. At some point, everyone who aspires to something greater is going to need some kind of a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Aerospace company that designs, builds, and launches communication and weather satellites, amongst other space related products and services.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: The rate of return--social and economic--far exceeds that from depositing in a multinational bank.
lender.occupational_info: I am an economist fighting for progressive economic policies and social democracy in the U.S. and around the world.

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who start their own business

lender.name: Richard Blake
lender.loan_because: by small and simple things are great things brought to pass.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hi-tech companies to help them raise money from investors, buy and sell other companies and comply with corporate governance and SEC regulations

lender.name: Angie, Emma & Alyssa
lender.loan_because: United we can change the balance and end all poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I run a business from home and home educate my children. I write for a magazine and write content for new age websites.

lender.name: Rupa
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to think I could make even a little difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and see the results of that rather than just donate at random. By loaning in this way I can help different people with the same money, over and over again, and I know those people can use the money for what they want and need.
lender.occupational_info: my work involves helping people if they can't use my companies computer systems, and if there are any problems or things that need to be changed I manage that process with the people who write the computer programme.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in empowerment. I am all about helping people that are trying to help themselves. What a creative way to make a dent in the poverty crisis!
lender.occupational_info: I work with the homeless in Detroit, MI leading a program to help those that are ready to get off the street obtain full-time employment and permanent housing.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.occupation: Director of Social and International Ministry

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in the world to be able to feed and educate their children so that their families and communities will be healthy and happy.
lender.occupational_info: I provide reports to our clients that detail the Service they are receiving based on our Service Level Agreements

lender.name: Yves
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to enable entrepreneurship around the world.

lender.name: Jan en Cisca
lender.loan_because: We loan because we think helping people to build their own business is the only way for sustainable development
lender.occupational_info: Jan: New business development in banking sector Cisca: geriatric doctor

lender.name: IBI Data/Dawn
lender.loan_because: Thank You Wendy Arnold for allowing us the opportunity to help people in other countries looking to improve their conditions and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps major foodservice manufacturers market their products.

lender.name: Mark & Barbara Morin
lender.loan_because: Want to help empower those who have real dreams to rise above poverty & make a difference in their lives
lender.occupational_info: Catalyst for Healthy Change

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I have been granted many blessings in this life and Kiva offers the opportunity of putting something back.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: because everyone in this world has the right to take care for himself and his children, i have enough for that, so i want to give other people a change in their lifes

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can - Humanity is my family, and I want to love and support them. Why wouldn't anyone do this?
lender.occupational_info: I serve others as often as I can, take care of their animals and make a point to smile and laugh and spread love . . .

lender.name: Sarete
lender.loan_because: I loan because I needed.

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: Kiva's site keeps me grounded. In suburban US neighborhoods it's easy to loose sight of what really matters. Seeing the faces and reading about the dreams of others around the world puts things in perspective.
lender.occupational_info: We have two sons, two daughters-in-law, and two adorable grandsons.

lender.name: Hossein
lender.loan_because: To Make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I manage differnet construction projects for Transit industry. It is very neat and I get to meet wonderful people. This picture was taken when I was building a tree-house for my kids in the back yard.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing lifts people out of poverty, and empowers them to support themselves by starting their own businesses. Entrepreneurs are an important part of any economy. They provide consumers with choices, create jobs for workers, and are innovators by creating new products and services or improving on existing ones. I am happy to be able to support and encourage entrepreneurship around the world, and highly recommend it to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am originally form southern California, and moved to south Florida to attend the University of Miami. I still reside in south Florida and work in the information technology field.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help sometimes..
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up, not a hand out. This provides on-going, hopefully long-term results. I enjoy working with entrepreneurs, and am always excited to encourage entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: "Your Small Business Advisors."

lender.name: Deborah
lender.occupation: Office Manager for ER Physicians Group
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I have a great job managing the day to day operations of a ER Physician's office.

lender.name: Rytis
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world. I know that money is very important for start-ups, as I am currently working on establishing my own company.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I believe these small loans can make a big difference in the lives of people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the U.S. Navy and run an Internet publishing business from my home office.

lender.name: Hemanshu
lender.loan_because: My parents worked very hard to make a living for our family and I want to help another family do the same. Life is full circle and this helps me remember that.
lender.occupational_info: I help figure out what companies we should invest our money in. So like how Kiva invests in people, we invest in companies. The main difference is that we do it for the hope of making a profit.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I support the desire to own a business and taken care of the family.
lender.occupational_info: I've started my own company so I am completely sympathetic to the challenges, frustrations and joys of owning a business.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: If I needed it, I'd hope someone would be willing to help me out so I should do the same. It all goes back to the golden rule.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I feel like it's a small way I can help others who might not have the same opportunities and resources that I do.

lender.name: Beau Brent
lender.loan_because: these people work harder than I have ever had to.
lender.occupational_info: I wouldn't try.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I admire people who want to take the initiative to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare financial statements for a large multinational corporation.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I like to help people make their own lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Trauma Center, taking care of sick and injured people.

lender.name: Omeed
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to a more sustainable future and believe that financial services should be available to all who can benefit from them
lender.occupational_info: Infrastructure and development

lender.name: A Quaker Meeting
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help spread peace throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a committee of Winston-Salem Friends Meeting that strives to promote peace and social justice.

lender.name: JC Logan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. America should step up to the plate and learn how to give and share, instead of take take take. We are very fortunate in this country. My mantra is "live to learn and learn to live". In helping one another achieve their dream we make the world a better place FOR ALL.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist that is blessed with a tremendous gift , The gift of creation, for which I am truly grateful. To enlighten others to find their gift and to act on the gift by giving back all that you are here to give.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Raising money.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: We all need help empowering each other now and then. I am grateful for what I have and send out what I can with hopefulness and love.

lender.name: Cobe
lender.loan_because: I believe that women will save the world - one small loan at a time - and since it takes so little to help - why not support these amazing women?
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office at a school board.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: The whole fish or fishing pole thing. This process seems efficient and effective.
lender.occupational_info: I work with data products about demographics and consumer behaviors.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I like helping people with their businesses.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build handheld computers and other useful gadgets.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: It's in the interest of humanity to do as much as possible to bring the developing world up to economic par with the Global North.

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: I have way more than I need.

lender.name: Ellis
lender.loan_because: It's an amazing way to break down the distance between human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a sociologist at the University of California, Davis. I teach. I write books. I try to make the world a little better.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a start and an opportunity. I was given many. Paying it forward. Also, this is a very safe, feel good investment: My returns are extraordinary!
lender.occupational_info: I teach International Business and Global Issues at Universities. My husband helps guide businesses in Human Resources decisions and training.

lender.name: Illy/ Carrie
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someones life, and spread kindness throughout the world.

lender.name: Allysum
lender.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an RV (caravan) Dealership as an Admin Assistant

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is the the single greatest opportunity in history to lift peopl from poverty.

lender.name: Venla
lender.loan_because: I find it inspiring to co-operate with people who are motivated and able to help themselves and people in their communities.

lender.name: Ponch
lender.loan_because: It's not money what we are lending. It's is Hope.

lender.name: Destiny
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and God has blessed me so I should return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children 8-9 years old basic math, reading and writing.

lender.name: Harm
lender.loan_because: A simple and effective way to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting citizens of Rotterdam in improving their own neighbourhood

lender.name: Chim
lender.loan_because:
I believe:
- In entrepreneurship - It is right to give a chance to someone to grow his or her own business. - In micro-financing - It is a matter of giving and receiving.
It is cool to recycle the loans to other people who need it.
Also, be generous to the world and the world may be generous to you.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a product specialist for Google. I launch new features and products and also I train the Brazilian sales team for all the news things from the company.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves but cannot afford to.
lender.occupational_info: clerical, secretarial in Dining at a university

lender.name: Eli
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending Highschool, and I am optimistic about my future.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: I hope that this small contribution can help people achieve their big dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.

lender.name: Greg & Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to see motivated and energetic people help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school science and math.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Poverty is like punishment for a crime you didn't commit.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a lawyer so I can advocate for those who need help and are disadvantaged in the legal system.

lender.name: VALENCIA
lender.loan_because: I GIVE BECAUSE "I SHOULD"... I don't have much in material things, but I do have a place to call home, a job to pay the bills and most importantly - my health. I AM BLESSED. :)

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: Even a small amount of money can make a huge difference in another part of the world.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneurial student, and I feel like lending really could help someone fund their own business, as I hope will someday will happen to me: in short, karma.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student learning about business

lender.name: Montana
lender.loan_because: I support Kiva's motives. People in poor countries deserve an opportunity to make money if they are willing to work.
lender.occupational_info: I design and install electrical systems (lights, power, etc.)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Alden
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to have a positive impact on others .

lender.name: Shanna
lender.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: My primary job is cleaning homes. I am also a graphic designer, as well as a Project Coordinator for an on-line newsletter that spreads environmental awareness.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that small loans can be combined to give someone a chance at a more fulfilling life, and it is a way of connecting with people and parts of the world in a positive and peaceful manner.
